item.title: 11 startups from YC Demo Day that investors are talking about
item.description: Here are some of the top startups from Y Combinator's Spring 2025 Demo Day that caught investors' and our attention.

item.title: What to expect at TechCrunch All Stage: One day, countless connections and takeaways
item.description: Whether you’re a founder gearing up for your next raise or a VC scouting your next portfolio win, TechCrunch All Stage, happening July 15 at Boston’s ...

item.title: Iconiq VCs spent two years courting Chime and the firm isn’t selling its stake
item.description: Iconiq pursued Chime because the founders were focused, and didn’t get distracted by "shiny new objects."

item.title: Scale AI confirms ‘significant’ investment from Meta, says CEO Alexandr Wang is leaving
item.description: Data-labeling firm Scale AI confirmed on Friday that it has received a "significant" investment from Meta that values the startup at $29 billion.

item.title: After a string of successes, early-stage fund Felicis raises fresh $900M
item.description: Lately, Felicis, like most VCs, has been all over AI. Its portfolio now includes, for example, Browser Use, Poolside, Runway, and Supabase.
